features: FAREWELL TO PAIN, SLEEP IN BLISS! Kaattop Neck Pillow is designed to address neck and shoulder pain. Featuring the thickened ARC Cervical Traction Area and the Hollow Concave Surface, our pillow naturally forms the perfect 15° angle of cervical traction, cradling your neck and spine in a way that's both comfortable and supportive. The crescent contour design perfectly matches the natural curve of your shoulders, and it offers ample space for your shoulders without feeling cramped or constricted.

VERSATILE PILLOW - YOUR PERSONALIZED PAIN RELIEF SYSTEM! Our firm pillow features 5 zones tailored to relieve individual pain. For back sleepers, the unique neck support area of the pillow aligns the cervical vertebrae, effectively relieving back pain, while the wider shoulder contour area eases pressure. Stomach sleeper will appreciate the S-shaped armrests that prevent hand numbness. And side sleepers will love the thickened side sleeping areas for optimal support. No more tossing and turning!

COMFORT & COOLING - Equipped with our Max 5.0 Arc-Chill cooling pillowcase, you'll experience an immediate cooling sensation as soon as you sleep on our cooling pillow. The 3D mesh design and open-cell memory foam promote optimal heat dissipation, ensuring a cool and refreshing night's sleep. This exceptional milk silk pillowcase is even softer than silk and silkier than regular pillowcases, which feel incredibly gentle against your skin. Enjoy the comfort of our orthopedic memory foam pillows.

HIGH-QUALITY & ADJUSTABLE HEIGHTS - YOUR SLEEP, YOUR WAY! We believe no two sleepers are alike. That's why we've designed our adjustable pillows to cater to the diverse needs of all. You can achieve the perfect height by either adding or removing inserts. And you can trust in the quality & safety of our pillows. Our pillows are rigorously tested and certified by OEKO-TEX, CertiPUR-US, and ISPA, ensuring they are non-toxic and completely odorless. NOTE: THE MEMORY FOAM SHOULD NEVER BE LAUNDERED.

HASSLE-FREE PURCHASE EXPERIENCE! If you're tired of restless nights and neck discomfort, it's time to try Kaattop cervical pillow for neck pain relief! If you have any inquiries about our neck pillows for pain relief sleeping, please feel free to contact Kaattop customer service. It's a good gift for dad, mom, fathers, mothers, girlfriends, boyfriends, husbands, wife & colleagues, birthdays Christmas gifts. Buy Kaattop ergonomic pillow for neck pain! Experience the bliss of pain-free sleeping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: high quality memory foam, very comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has maintained its shape and support even after extended use.
reviews.reviewText: This pillow has not only improved my sleep quality but also alleviated some long-standing neck pain. This pillow is specifically designed to support the natural curvature of the neck. This design is great for those who, like me, have struggled with neck discomfort. It cradles the neck and head in the perfect position, providing optimal spinal alignment. The memory foam in this pillow is incredibly comfortable. It contours to the shape of my head and neck, offering a custom and luxurious sleeping experience. It's neither too firm nor too soft, striking the perfect balance for a good night's sleep. I've been dealing with neck pain for a while, and this pillow has made a noticeable difference. I wake up feeling refreshed and with significantly reduced neck stiffness and soreness. It's as though the pillow is actively working to alleviate my discomfort. I think most of my neck pain is from all the tension from sitting at a desk all day, but sleep is so important and I feel this pillow has helped me get a good night's sleep. The materials used are hypoallergenic and breathable, which is a plus for anyone with allergies or sensitivities. I appreciate the breathability of the pillow, as it keeps me cool and comfortable throughout the night. I'm going through menopause, so being cool at night is another plus!! The pillow's quality and durability are evident. It has maintained its shape and support even after extended use. This means I can enjoy its benefits for a long time without concerns about it losing its effectiveness. The most important aspect is that it has significantly improved the quality of my sleep. I fall asleep faster, wake up less frequently during the night, and feel more rested in the morning. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This pillow has just the right amount of firmness for me. I am a side sleeper most of the time. It helps me to sleep more comfortably and consistently throughout the night. I've also found that my migraines are not as severe with this pillow. I also tend to run hot and it has a nice cooling effect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well-packed funkily shaped solid pillow
reviews.reviewText: The pillow is trapezoid-shaped with a slight crater in the middle of it, which allows the neck to stretch a bit more than a flat-style pillow. It arrived well-packed, folded in half, clean and no weird smells. It's sold as a remedy for snoring, designed primarily for side sleepers (but decent enough for back sleepers), which so far it has delivered. Have been using it for more than a week now, and it didn't lose the sturdiness.The trapezoid is higher on one side than the other, so you can kinda adjust the neck level that's the most comfortable for you. I like the lower longer side up when reading and shorter side up when sleeping, but that's just me.The pillow came with an instruction manual, which felt a bit unnecessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and comfortable pillow. Great value for the cost and feels like sleeping on a cloud! Would recommend for anyone as it has a good amount of firmness and softness that would make it comfortable for anyone young or old!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable pillow
reviews.reviewText: This is the most comfortable pillow i have ever owned. I'm a back/side sleeper and it has the perfect amount of support and softness. I paired it with a satin pillowcase and i'm having the best sleep of my life!
